action.Name: action
action.Description: Do an action (or suggest an image for an action) on a member.
action.ChoiceDescription: What action would you like to do?
action.SuggestDescription: Suggest an image for addition of an action.

avatar.Name: avatar
avatar.Description: Get the avatar of a user.

default.Role: You can't ban this user, because they're higher than you!
default.Punished: You can't ban this user, since they are banned already!

server.Message: has been banned from the server for

permission.Myself: :warning: Insufficient Permission - You need the following permission: ``Ban Members``.
permission.Me: :warning: Insufficient Permission - I need the following permission: ``Ban Members``.

blacklist.Name: blacklist
blacklist.Description: Blacklist System - Protect your server against bad user.
blacklist.AddDescription: Add a user to the blacklist.
blacklist.AddReasonDescription: Reason for adding the user to the blacklist.
blacklist.AddEvidenceDescription: Evidence of the action done by the user.
blacklist.RemoveDescription: Remove a user of the blacklist.
blacklist.CheckDescription: Check if a user is blacklisted.
blacklist.SuggestDescription: Suggest a user to be blacklisted.
blacklist.SuggestUserDescription: User to suggest addition to the blacklist.
blacklist.SuggestEvidenceDescription: Evidence of the action done by the user.

help.Name: help
help.Description: Display the commands available (or information about a certain command).

default.Role: You can't kick this user, because they're higher than you!

permission.Me: :warning: Insufficient Permission - I need the following permission: ``Kick Members``.

default.Done: The channel has been successfully locked.

settings.SetupActionDescription: Change the settings of the command: Action.

settings.LoggingOptionsDescription: Change the logging channel of a certain event.
